text: Follow the Call is the debut studio album by Britt Nicole. The album was released on January 10, 2003. ==Track listing== # "Follow the Call" – 3:07 # "Why?" – 3:12 # "Peace" – 3:15 # "Buses and Trains" – 3:42 # "What They Say" – 2:50 # "Simply Because" – 2:38 # "I Will Obey" – 3:22 # "He Died" – 3:32 # "Come to Christ" – 3:31 ==References== Category:2003 albums
title: Follow the Call
